clauses.title: Appointment
clauses.body: {{company_name}} (the 'Company') appoints {{sales_rep_name}} (the 'Sales Rep') as an independent sales representative starting {{start_date}}{{#if territory}} for the territory of {{territory}}{{/if}}. The Sales Rep will promote and sell the Company's products or services to potential customers.

clauses.title: Commission Structure
clauses.body: The Company will pay commissions according to this structure: {{commission_structure}}. Commissions are earned when the customer completes payment and the sale is finalized. Refunds, chargebacks, or cancelled orders will result in commission adjustments.

clauses.title: Payment Terms
clauses.body: Commissions will be calculated and paid {{payment_frequency}}. The Company will provide detailed statements showing sales, commissions earned, and any adjustments. Payment will be made within 30 days of the payment period ending.

clauses.title: Sales Rep Responsibilities
clauses.body: The Sales Rep will actively promote the Company's offerings and maintain professional relationships with customers. The Sales Rep is responsible for their own expenses, including travel, phone, and marketing costs, unless otherwise agreed in writing.

clauses.title: Independent Contractor Status
clauses.body: The Sales Rep is an independent contractor, not an employee. The Sales Rep is responsible for all taxes, insurance, and business expenses. The Sales Rep may represent other companies unless they directly compete with the Company's offerings.

clauses.title: Confidentiality
clauses.body: The Sales Rep agrees to keep all customer lists, pricing information, and business strategies confidential during and after this Agreement. Customer relationships developed during this Agreement remain the Company's property.

clauses.title: Termination
clauses.body: Either party may terminate this Agreement with 30 days' written notice. The Company may terminate immediately for breach of terms or unethical sales practices. The Sales Rep will receive commissions for sales finalized before termination, paid according to normal terms.

clauses.title: Governing Law
clauses.body: This Agreement is governed by the laws of New York. Any disputes will be resolved in the state or federal courts of New York.

clauses.title: Signatures
clauses.body:
By signing below, both parties agree to the terms of this Commission Agreement.

Company Representative: _________________ Date: _______

Sales Representative: _________________ Date: _______
